name: 東方幻工場 ~ Ultimate Fairy Design
name_original: 東方幻工場 ~ Ultimate Fairy Design
description:
Design the ultimate fairy with Cirno and Clownpiece, then bring her to life and train with her to become the strongest!

Controls: Z to fire, Shift to focus

Credits:

Programmer: Alonzo Church's Chicken

Artist and Designer: PKNerd-Catfox

Phonometrician: RaysonWilliams

This game is based on Team Shanghai Alice's Shrine Maiden Project and developed and published in accordance with their derivative content guidelines.
